Word Similarity.outperforms: outperforms the baseline on all datasets
Word Similarity.from sentence: From the table, we can see that our method consistently outperforms the baseline on all datasets.

Language Modeling.outperforms: our method outperforms the two baselines
Language Modeling.from sentence: In all these settings, our method outperforms the two baselines.

outperform.from sentence: We outperform the baselines for 1.06/0.71 in the term of BLEU in transformer_base and transformer_big settings in WMT14 English-German task, respectively.

outperforms.from sentence: The model learned from adversarial training also outperforms original one in IWSLT14 German-English task by 0.85.

Test Classification.from sentence: Text Classification Our method outperforms the baseline method for 1.26%/0.66%/0.44% on three different datasets.
